name: Road 34
description:
- Mission Instructions -

Click to jump to the next planet. Click a second time while passing trough the vortex

Vortex are more powerful when they are smaller.

Your fan-club is following you, and will grow up when you pass small enough vortexes, but will gradualy leave you if you don't impress them or if you stay too much time on a planet.

Made in 7 days by a 3 person team.

Have fun !
